verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, prophesy<WH5012> against the prophets<WH5030> of Israel<WH3478> that prophesy<WH5012>, and say<WH559> thou unto them that prophesy<WH5030> out of their own heart<WH3820>, Hear<WH8085> ye the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>:
Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>, Woe<WH1945> unto the foolish<WH5036> prophets<WH5030>, that follow<WH1980> their own spirit<WH7307>, and have seen nothing<WH7200>!
O Israel<WH3478>, thy prophets<WH5030> have been like foxes<WH7776> in the waste places<WH2723>.

Ye have not gone up<WH5927> into the gaps<WH6556>, neither built up<WH1443> the wall<WH1447> for the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, to stand<WH5975> in the battle<WH4421> in the day<WH3117> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

They have seen<WH2372> falsehood<WH7723> and lying<WH3577> divination<WH7081>, that say<WH559>, Jehovah<WH3068> saith<WH5002>; but Jehovah<WH3068> hath not sent<WH7971> them<WH3176>: and they have made men to hope that the word<WH1697> would be confirmed<WH6965>.

Have ye not seen<WH2372> a false<WH7723> vision<WH4236>, and have ye not spoken<WH1696> a lying<WH3577> divination<WH4738>, in that ye say<WH559>, Jehovah<WH3068> saith<WH5002>; albeit I have not spoken<WH559>?

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because ye have spoken<WH1696> falsehood<WH7723>, and seen<WH2372> lies<WH3577>, therefore<WH5002>, behold, I am against you, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

And my hand<WH3027> shall be against the prophets<WH5030> that see<WH2374> false<WH7723> visions<WH7080>, and that divine lies<WH3577>: they shall not be in the council<WH5475> of my people<WH5971>, neither shall they be written<WH3789> in the writing<WH3791> of the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, neither shall they enter<WH935> into the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

Because <WH2937>, even because they have seduced my people<WH5971>, saying<WH559>, Peace<WH7965>; and there is no peace<WH7965>; and when one buildeth up<WH1129> a wall<WH2434>, behold<WH2009>, they daub<WH2902> it with untempered mortar<WH8602>:

say <WH559> unto them that daub<WH2902> it with untempered<WH8602> mortar<WH5307>, that it shall fall: there shall be an overflowing<WH7857> shower<WH1653>; and ye<WH859>, O great hailstones<WH417>, shall fall<WH5307>; and a stormy<WH5591> wind<WH7307> shall rend it<WH1234>.
Lo <WH7023>, when the wall is fallen<WH5307>, shall it not be said<WH559> unto you<WH2915>, Where is the daubing wherewith ye have daubed it<WH2902>?

Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: I will even rend<WH1234> it with a stormy<WH5591> wind<WH7307> in my wrath<WH2534>; and there shall be an overflowing<WH7857> shower<WH1653> in mine anger<WH639>, and great hailstones<WH417> in wrath<WH2534> to consume it<WH3617>.

So will I break down<WH2040> the wall<WH7023> that ye have daubed<WH2902> with untempered<WH8602> mortar<WH5060>, and bring it down to the ground<WH776>, so that the foundation<WH3247> thereof shall be uncovered<WH1540>; and it shall fall<WH5307>, and ye shall be consumed<WH3615> in the midst<WH8432> thereof<WH3045>: and ye shall know that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

Thus will I accomplish<WH3615> my wrath<WH2534> upon the wall<WH7023>, and upon them that have daubed<WH2902> it with untempered<WH8602> mortar<WH559>; and I will say unto you<WH7023>, The wall is no more<WH2902>, neither they that daubed it;

to wit<WH5030>, the prophets of Israel<WH3478> that prophesy<WH5012> concerning Jerusalem<WH3389>, and that see<WH2374> visions<WH2377> of peace<WH7965> for her<WH7965>, and there is no peace, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.

And thou<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> against the daughters<WH1323> of thy people<WH5971>, that prophesy<WH5012> out of their own heart<WH3820>; and prophesy thou against them<WH5012>,

and say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Woe<WH1945> to the women that sew<WH8609> pillows<WH3704> upon all elbows<WH679>, and make<WH6213> kerchiefs<WH4555> for the head<WH7218> of persons of every stature<WH6967> to hunt<WH6679> souls<WH5315>! Will ye hunt<WH6679> the souls<WH5315> of my people<WH5971>, and save<WH2421> souls<WH5315> alive for yourselves<WH2421>?

And ye have profaned<WH2490> me among my people<WH5971> for handfuls<WH8168> of barley<WH8184> and for pieces<WH6595> of bread<WH3899>, to slay<WH4191> the souls<WH5315> that should not die<WH4191>, and to save<WH2421> the souls<WH5315> alive<WH2421> that should not live<WH2421>, by your lying<WH3576> to my people<WH5971> that hearken<WH8085> unto lies<WH3577>.

Wherefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: Behold<WH3704>, I am against your pillows, wherewith ye<WH859> there hunt<WH6679> the souls<WH5315> to make them fly<WH6524>, and I will tear<WH7167> them from your arms<WH2220>; and I will let the souls<WH5315> go<WH7971>, even the souls<WH5315> that ye hunt<WH6679> to make them fly<WH6524>.

Your kerchiefs<WH4555> also will I tear<WH7167>, and deliver<WH5337> my people<WH5971> out of your hand<WH3027>, and they shall be no more in your hand<WH3027> to be hunted<WH4686>; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.

Because with lies<WH8267> ye have grieved<WH3512> the heart<WH3820> of the righteous<WH6662>, whom I have not made sad<WH3512>; and strengthened<WH2388> the hands<WH3027> of the wicked<WH7451>, that he should not return<WH7725> from his wicked<WH7563> way<WH1870>, and be saved alive<WH2421>;

therefore ye shall no more see<WH2372> false<WH7723> visions<WH7080>, nor divine divinations<WH7081>: and I will deliver<WH5337> my people<WH5971> out of your hand<WH3027>; and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.
